data.title: Hotels in Matanzas: prices, booking, rating
data.meta_description: The province of Matanzas, famous for its beautiful nature and the charm of the African past, has an impeccable reputation among the most demanding tourists. Booking hotels in Matanzas Province at the best prices.
data.text:
Hotels in Matanzas.

Hotels in Matanzas! Best offers at the best prices from Karamba Tours! The colonial charm of the architecture of the city of Matanzas will not leave indifferent even the most experienced traveler! "Murder" or "slaughterhouse" - this is how it is translated from the Spanish Matanzas. Its scary name of the province was not without reason. There was a fierce battle between Spanish conquistadors and local aborigines. However, despite its name, the province of Matanzas (the Spanish word Matanzas), famous for its beautiful nature and the charm of the African past, has an impeccable reputation among the most demanding tourists. Since the XIX century, the province has become an important enclave of the national economy, thanks to the enormous tourism potential and achievements of the agricultural sector. The city of Matanzas is also called the "city of bridges", there are 17. The rivers flow through the whole city. In the province with the same name is the highest bridge on the Island - the Bakunayaga Bridge. Its height is 110 meters. From the bridge, you can see the landscapes of the Yumuri valley. Among the main attractions of the city is the chapel of Montserrat, the castle of San Severino, as well as the Sauto Theater, famous for the performances of Sarah Bernhard and Anna Pavlova. The building of the Sauto Theater is located on Vijia Square, which is considered the site of the founding of Matanzas. There are many interesting sights on this square, among which there is the Junco Palace, where the city museum of the city is located. A few kilometers from the city there are caves with stalactites and stalagmites inside. Book hotel rooms in Matanzas online with Karamba Tours!
